cop4331.model

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • cop4331.model.Inventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<LineItem>

    public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<LineItem>
    A class that holds a sellers list of Line items. This class implements iterable LineItem interface. we get iterator() method needed for iterator design pattern to work.
